amendment.description: To provide for a study and report on the propagation of concierge care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1557 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1557 proposed by Senator Nelson FL to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11052-11053; text: CR S11052) To provide for a study and report on the propagation of concierge care.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1557 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1557 proposed by Senator Nelson FL to Amendment SA 1542.
